review: Life changing.Totally changed the way I interface with my TV. Makes my TV really fun to use.Works great. The voice search is perfect. This is so good I wound up buying the stickan HDX 8.5, an HD7 a firestick for my sister, an Echo. And it all just makes the Fire TVeven better. Anything I buy for my tablet becomes available for my Fire TV. It was perfect timingthat the Fire TV added USB storage. I was out of space for big new apps. Now I could go on forever. I don't think any of the other set boxes could be superior.

review: Liked it but for the $ I was disappointed that I couldn't run media from my flash drive through it with out having to go through jail-breaking this device and I'm just not skilled enough to do that. Plus from my understanding it voids any type of warranty. All I wanted was a device to play my flash-drive and to stream Netflix and Amazon Prime, Guess I'll stick with an old bluray player and just get the fire stick. Eh, saves me $60.
